epics.title: User Authentication and Security
epics.summary: Implement secure user authentication and security features.
epics.description: Develop a secure login mechanism that includes multi-factor authentication to ensure that only authorized users can access the banking portal. This epic includes creating secure user sessions and managing secure storage of user credentials and session keys.

epics.title: Personalized Dashboard
epics.summary: Create a personalized dashboard for users.
epics.description: Develop a user-friendly, customizable dashboard that displays relevant banking products and services based on the user's profile and eligibility. This dashboard should provide users with an overview of their accounts, transactions, and other financial activities.

epics.title: Account Opening and Service Modifications
epics.summary: Enable users to submit account opening requests and service modifications.
epics.description: Implement streamlined workflows that allow users to submit new account opening requests and service modifications with minimal clicks. This includes forms for data entry, validation, and submission, along with workflows for approval and processing of these requests.

epics.title: Responsive Design
epics.summary: Develop a responsive design for the portal.
epics.description: Ensure that the portal is responsive and provides a consistent user experience across various devices, including desktop, tablet, and mobile phones. This involves implementing adaptive layouts and testing on different screen sizes and operating systems.

epics.title: Real-time Status Updates and Notifications
epics.summary: Provide real-time status updates and notifications.
epics.description: Develop features to provide users with real-time status updates on their requests and transactions, along with email notifications. This ensures users are kept informed about the progress of their submissions and any necessary actions they need to take.

epics.title: Interaction History and Documentation Upload
epics.summary: Maintain a comprehensive interaction history and enable document uploads.
epics.description: Implement functionality to keep a detailed history of user interactions within the portal. Additionally, develop features to allow users to upload necessary documentation directly through the interface, ensuring that users can save and resume incomplete applications.

epics.title: Core Banking System Integration
epics.summary: Integrate the portal with the bank's core banking system.
epics.description: Ensure seamless integration of the self-service portal with the bank's existing core banking system. This involves developing secure APIs, data synchronization mechanisms, and maintaining a separate database to ensure optimal performance and reliability.

epics.title: Role-based Access Control
epics.description: Develop and implement role-based access control to ensure that users can only view and access services appropriate to their profile and authorization level. This includes defining roles, permissions, and access policies tailored to different types of users.

user_stories.title: Secure Login with Multi-factor Authentication
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to log in securely using multi-factor authentication, so that my account remains protected from unauthorized access.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Secure authentication, multi-factor authentication, user account protection
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User should be prompted for a second authentication factor after entering password.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a valid password, when user enters the correct second factor, then login is successful.

user_stories.title: Create and Manage User Sessions
user_stories.description: As a user, I want my session to be managed securely, so that my account details are safe during my interactions.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Session management, secure sessions, user activity tracking
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User sessions should expire after a set period of inactivity.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user session, when the user is inactive for the defined period, then the session should terminate.

user_stories.title: Secure Storage of Credentials
user_stories.description: As a user, I want my credentials to be stored securely, so that they are not compromised.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Secure storage, encryption, credential management
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User credentials should be encrypted and stored securely.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a set of user credentials, when the credentials are stored, then they should be encrypted.

user_stories.title: Customizable User Dashboard
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a customizable dashboard, so that I can view relevant information based on my profile.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Customizable dashboard, user profile, relevant information
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Dashboard should display user-specific information based on their profile.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user with specific profile settings, when the dashboard loads, then it should display information relevant to the user's profile.

user_stories.title: Overview of Accounts and Transactions
user_stories.description: As a user, I want an overview of my accounts and transactions, so that I can easily track my financial activities.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Account overview, transaction history, financial tracking
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User should see a summary of their accounts and recent transactions.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user with multiple accounts, when the dashboard loads, then it should show a summary of all accounts and recent transactions.

user_stories.title: Display Relevant Banking Products
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to see banking products relevant to my profile, so that I can explore available services.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Relevant products, user profile, banking services
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Dashboard should suggest banking products based on user profile.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user profile, when user logs in, then dashboard should display relevant banking products.

user_stories.title: Simple Account Opening Workflow
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a simple workflow to open a new account, so that I can complete the process with minimal effort.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Account opening, simple workflow, minimal effort
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Account opening process should be completed in a few steps.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user willing to open an account, when user provides necessary information, then the account should be opened with minimal clicks.

user_stories.title: Service Modification Workflow
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to modify my account services easily, so that I can update my service preferences as needed.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Service modification, simple workflow, user preferences
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Service modification process should be straightforward and user-friendly.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user looking to modify services, when user selects new preferences, then the services should be updated accordingly.

user_stories.title: Data Entry and Validation
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to ensure my data is valid when opening an account, so that I can avoid errors and delays.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Data entry, validation, error prevention
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Data entry forms should validate user input before submission.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user entering data, when user submits the form, then the data should be validated for correctness and completeness.

user_stories.title: Consistent User Experience on All Devices
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the portal to be responsive, so that I have a consistent experience on any device.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Responsive design, consistent user experience, cross-device compatibility
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Portal should adjust layout and functionality based on device used.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user accessing the portal from any device, when user navigates the portal, then the experience should be consistent across all devices.

user_stories.title: Adaptive Layouts for Multiple Screen Sizes
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the portal layouts to adapt to my screen size, so that I can use it comfortably on desktop, tablet, and mobile.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Adaptive layouts, screen size detection, usability
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Layouts should adapt based on the screen size and orientation.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user accessing the portal from various devices, when user changes screen size, then the layout should adjust accordingly.

user_stories.title: Cross-Platform Testing
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the portal tested on different platforms, so that it works reliably across all operating systems.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Cross-platform testing, compatibility, reliable performance
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Portal should function correctly across different operating systems.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user accessing the portal from various platforms, when user performs actions, then the portal should work reliably on all supported operating systems.

user_stories.title: Real-time Transaction Status Updates
user_stories.description: As a user, I want real-time status updates on my transactions, so that I can stay informed about their progress.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Real-time updates, transaction status, user notifications
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User should receive real-time updates on transaction statuses.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user performing transactions, when the transaction status changes, then the user should receive real-time updates.

user_stories.title: Email Notifications for Important Updates
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to receive email notifications for important updates, so that I can take necessary actions promptly.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Email notifications, important updates, prompt actions
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users should receive email notifications for critical updates.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user with pending actions, when an important update occurs, then the user should receive an email notification.

user_stories.title: Real-time Status Updates for Requests
user_stories.description: As a user, I want real-time updates on my requests, so that I can know their status and prepare for any required actions.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Real-time updates, request status, user information
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users should receive real-time updates on the status of their submitted requests.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user submitting requests, when the request status changes, then the user should receive real-time updates.

user_stories.title: Maintain Detailed Interaction History
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to see a detailed history of my interactions, so that I can review my activities.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Interaction history, user activities, review
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User interaction history should be recorded and accessible.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user performing actions, when user checks the interaction history, then all activities should be listed accurately.

user_stories.title: Document Upload Functionality
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to upload documents securely, so that I can provide necessary information for my requests.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Document upload, secure storage, user information
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users should be able to upload documents securely through the portal.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user needing to submit documents, when user uploads a document, then it should be stored securely and retrievable.

user_stories.title: Save and Resume Incomplete Applications
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to save and resume my incomplete applications, so that I can complete them later without starting over.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Save and resume, incomplete applications, user convenience
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users should be able to save and resume incomplete applications.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user starting an application, when user saves progress, then the application should be resumable from the same point.

user_stories.title: Develop Secure APIs for Integration
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to create secure APIs for integrating the portal with the core banking system, so that data can be synchronized safely.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Secure APIs, integration, data synchronization
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: APIs should be secure and effectively integrate with the core banking system.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the core banking system, when data is accessed via APIs, then the communication should be secured.

user_stories.title: Data Synchronization Mechanisms
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want synchronization mechanisms in place, so that data between the portal and the core banking system is always up to date.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Data synchronization, real-time updates, consistency
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Data should be synchronized between the portal and the core banking system in real-time.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a transaction or request, when data is updated in the core banking system, then it should reflect immediately in the portal.

user_stories.title: Maintain Separate Database for Performance
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want a separate database for the portal, so that performance and reliability are maintained without burdening the core banking system.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Separate database, performance, reliability
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: A separate database should be maintained for storing portal-specific data.
user_stories.test_cases: Given transactions through the portal, when data is stored, then it should be maintained in the portal-specific database.

user_stories.title: Define User Roles and Permissions
user_stories.description: As an admin, I want to define user roles and permissions, so that users have access only to the functionalities they are authorized to.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Role-based access control, user roles, permissions
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User roles and permissions should be clearly defined and enforced.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a defined set of roles, when a user logs in, then they should only access features assigned to their role.

user_stories.title: Implement Access Policies
user_stories.description: As an admin, I want to implement access policies, so that users' permissions are enforced according to their roles.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Access policies, role enforcement, security
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Access policies should enforce the permissions according to user roles.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user with a specific role, when they try to access a restricted feature, then the access should be denied.

user_stories.title: Tailor Access to Different User Types
user_stories.description: As an admin, I want to tailor access to different user types, so that the portal is usable and secure for all users.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: User types, tailored access, security
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Access should be customized based on user type and profile.
user_stories.test_cases: Given different user types, when users log in, then their access should be tailored according to their type and authority.

architecture_generation.description: AWS architecture aligned to equivalent service mappings.

architecture_validation.updatedDescription: The architecture diagram has been validated and enhanced to ensure all nodes and edges are consistent, unique, and complete. Placeholder nodes were added for missing references, and duplicate IDs were resolved. The architecture now adheres to the Azure Well-Architected Framework with improved security, reliability, and operational excellence. Quality rating: High.
